name: Summer Fresh Strawberry Pie
author: Susanna1210
summary: A spin on a favorite from Strawn's Eat Shop in Shreveport, Louisiana - best fresh fruit pies ever! Plan to share this strawberry pie - it's best within about 24 hours of making it - or put on your stretchy pants and eat the whole thing yourself. You may or may not be sorry.
ingredients: 3 drops red food coloring, or as desired  (Optional)
3 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, or to taste
directions: Stir sugar, cornstarch, and salt together in a medium saucepan
Add 3 tablespoons water and mix into a paste
Bring remaining water to a boil in a pot
Let mixture simmer over low heat, stirring constantly, until thick and clear, about 5 minutes
Add lemon juice, almond extract, and red food coloring
Let mixture cool for at least 15 minutes; fold in strawberries
Pour into the prepared pie crust
Chill until set, at least 1 hour
Whip heavy cream in a mixing bowl using an electric mixer; add confectioners' sugar slowly until combined
